item.description: The Greater Boston Business and Professional chapter of The John Birch Society will host Barry James Dyke, author of "The Pirates of Manhattan: Systemitically Plundering The American Consumer and How to Protect Against It" Mr. Dyke is president and Founder of Castgle Asset management and his writings have appeared in numerous journals including "TheNational Underwriter" and "Broker World." He is a free market advocate of the Austrian School.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be using the function room
item.name: John Birch Society Business and Professonal Luncheon with author Barry J. Dyke
